data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of the leafhopper genus Zyginella Loew from Southwest China (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Yuehua, Li, Zizhong (2012): Description of a new species of the leafhopper genus Zyginella Loew from Southwest China (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae). ZooKeys 168: 13-17, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.168.2171, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.168.2171
